Name: The Mackinnon
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Honeyed rum with herbal and citrus nuances. Perhaps better served on-the-rocks.
History: Named after the MacKinnon family, the owners of Drambuie liqueur, at least they were when this cocktail was created. The brand is now owned by William Grant.
Nutrition: One serving of The Mackinnon contains 225 calories
